mapper.select: SELECT contract_code, user.user_name, keyword.key_name, substring(contract_sdate, 12, 5) start FROM contract JOIN user ON contract.user_code=user.user_code JOIN keyword ON contract.key_code=keyword.key_code WHERE contract.co_code=#{coCode} AND (#{start} BETWEEN date_format(contract.contract_sdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format(contract.contract_edate, '%Y-%m-%d'))
